name: Pensions
text: §54-29  Pensions.  All officers and employees of the board of water supply shall be entitled to the benefits of part II of chapter 88.  The employer's contribution to the retirement fund, as provided thereunder, shall be paid from the funds under the control of the board. [L 1961, c 155, pt of §1; Supp, §145A-19; HRS §54-29]
